com.googlecode.sarasvati.env

Class AttributeConverters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.sarasvati.env.AttributeConverters

  • public class AttributeConverters
extends Object
    Static utility class for registering and using AttributeConverters. Note that registering converters is NOT thread-safe, and should be done at startup.
    Author:
    Paul Lorenz
